WorkItem.Description:
I've experienced this issue only on Healadin model at the moment; some random items like Reinforced Sapphirium Mantle and Darkmoon Card: Tsunami are correctly cached with all statistics (I can find them from "Edit Items" window), but when I try to equip them from gear lists I can't find them.
I tried to enable every drop source, all ilvl and type of items from filters but nothing changed.
Resetting cache, deleting the specific item from cache and reloading it from wowhead doesn't work either, I think they just miss the link to this specific module, in fact the Darkmoon Card does show in the Druid Resto model.
WorkItem.Summary: [Healadin] Option to not display spirit items should be removed

Comments.Message: You're right, actually Healadin model ignores every item with Spirit; I've found the option to disable this filter but unchecking it doesn't change anything, probably it doesn't work, like the other one for hit items (always active).

Play around with those 3 boxes (spirit, hit & PvP).   I remember back in the day there was an issue where you had to turn all 3 options on or off to have the items appear.     This was back in Rawr 2, but it may not have been fixed.

Not a bug, check the options screen to turn off hiding of spirit items. The proc for Tsunami may not be set up in yours or the default item cache.



** Closed by Jothay 1/20/2011 9:35 AM
Going to reopen and rename this.  That checkbox needs to be obliterated, spirit is now a good Healadin stat.
